title.rendered: POINTER EXCEL II Digital Acupuncture and Pressure Point Locator

content.rendered:
The latest and most advanced user friendly hand held point locator and stimulator. Features a built-in 9 x 25mm (0.35”x 1.0”) LCD digital display meter for location of acupuncture and trigger points. The meter reading increases in relative value from 1 to 500 due to a lowering of the electrical resistance of the skin at the acu-point location. Besides the meter, point location is also indicated with sound and a pilot light on top of the unit. Point location sensitivity is adjustable.

After detection, an effective push button adjustable stimulation offers immediate point treatment. Based on the setting of the output dial, either normal milli-amp output or micro-amp current output is produced(ie, blue zone on the dial is microamp).

This new device also includes more advanced features. The frequency is adjustable (1 to 16 Hz) and is also displayed on the LCD digital display when the stimulation button is pressed. Furthermore, a polarity reversal switch offers the options of tonification (-) or sedation (+) treatment.

Features two grounding plates on the unit (allowing use with either left or right hands) as well as a hand probe with grounding rod and attached wire. Two probe tips are included with unit: ear, 2mm and body, 4mm.Other standard accessories include 9 volt battery, carry case, and instructions.

The Pointer Excel II Digital Acupuncture Locator includes:

  • Two grounding plates for use with either left or right hands
  • Hand probe with grounding pole and attached wire
  • Two probe tips: 2 mm (0.08) and body 4 mm (0.16)
  • Carrying Case
  • 9 volt battery
  • Instructions

Made in Hong Kong.

Specifications 500 ohm test load
Output ~ Single probe
Frequency ~ 1-16 Hz
Frequency Meter ~ LCD
Volts & Current
Normal Dial ~ 0 to 22 milliamps
Blue Zone ~ 0 to 2 microamps
Polarity Reversal ~ +/- by switch
Pulse width ~ 220 microseconds
Pulse shape ~ asymmetric biphasic square wave
Pulse mode ~ continuous
Point detection ~ meter, sound and light indication
Power source ~ one 9 volt battery
Size ~ 215 x 40 x 25 mms (8.6” x 1.5” x 1”)
Weight, colour ~ 86 grams (0.1 lb), beige
Warranty ~ one year

excerpt.rendered:
Low & fair prices for high quality goods
High customer satisfaction
Fast shipping, dispatched in four business days or less. Most metro orders are delivered within 1-4 working days.
100% secure shopping and safe checkout.
Australian trusted store, Australian based and owned. Your order is shipped from an Australian warehouse.
